title: Висина кон хипотенузата
prompt: Draw a right-angled triangle ABC with the right angle at the top vertex C. Draw the altitude CD perpendicular to the hypotenuse AB. Label the segments AD as 4 and BD as 9. Label the altitude CD as h.

title: Рамностран триаголник во квадрат
prompt: Draw a square ABCD. Inside the square, draw an equilateral triangle ABE sharing the side AB. Draw segments DE and CE connecting the inner vertex E to the top corners D and C. Mark the angle DEC as the target angle. Highlight that AE=AD and BE=BC to show isosceles triangles.

title: Плоштина на впишан триаголник во правоаголник
prompt: Draw rectangle ABCD with A at bottom-left. Place E on AB such that AE=1/3 AB, F on BC such that BF=2/3 BC, and G as midpoint of AD. Shade triangle EFG.

title: Поделба на дијагонала во квадрат
prompt: Draw square ABCD. Draw diagonal AC and diagonal BD intersecting at O. Mark M as midpoint of CD and N as midpoint of BC. Connect AM and AN.

title: Должина на симетрала преку разлика на страни
prompt: Draw triangle ABC with angle A=40 and B=20. Draw bisector CM. Mark point D on AB such that BD=BC.

title: Агли на основа во специфичен трапез
prompt: Draw trapezoid ABCD. Mark midpoints M on AB and N on CD. Draw segment MN. Draw auxiliary lines from N parallel to AD and BC.

title: Периметар преку релација на висини
prompt: null

title: Агли кај специфичен рамнокрак триаголник
prompt: Draw isosceles triangle ABC. Draw altitude CC1 to base AB. Draw angle bisector AA1. Mark D as midpoint of BA1 and connect C1D.

title: Идентитет на нормали во произволен триаголник
prompt: Draw triangle ABC with an internal point M. Draw perpendicular segments from M to sides BC (labeled x), AC (labeled y), and AB (labeled z). Draw segments MA, MB, and MC to show the triangle division.

title: Збир на нормали од темиња на паралелограм
prompt: Draw parallelogram ABCD touching line p only at point D. Draw line p at an angle. Drop perpendiculars from A to p (point M), B to p (point N), and C to p (point O). Mark the center of the parallelogram as S and drop perpendicular SS'.

title: Конкурентност на тежишни линии во паралелограм
prompt: Draw parallelogram ABCD. Mark M as midpoint of BC and N as midpoint of CD. Draw DM and BN. Draw diagonal AC and show they intersect on it. Draw auxiliary diagonal BD.

title: Теорема на Вивиани
prompt: Draw an equilateral triangle ABC. Place a point S inside. Draw three perpendicular lines from S to the three sides. Label them SM, SN, SP. Draw a vertical altitude h for comparison.

title: Проекции на хипотенуза и агли
prompt: Draw a right triangle ABC with right angle at C. Draw altitude CD to hypotenuse AB. Mark segments AD=p and BD=q. Mark point E on AD such that DE=q. Highlight triangles CBE and AEC.

title: Агол кај центарот на впишана кружница
prompt: Draw a general triangle ABC. Construct the internal angle bisectors of angle A and angle B. Mark their intersection as I. Label the angle at C as gamma.

title: Агол кај ортоцентарот
prompt: Draw an acute triangle ABC. Draw altitude AD to BC and altitude BE to AC. Mark their intersection as H. Highlight the quadrilateral CDHE.

title: Агол меѓу висина и симетрала
prompt: Draw triangle ABC with AC significantly longer than AB. Draw altitude AD from A to BC. Draw internal angle bisector AS from A to BC. Label angle B as beta and angle C as gamma.

title: Агол меѓу внатрешна и надворешна симетрала
prompt: Draw triangle ABC. Extend side CB beyond B to create an external angle at B. Draw internal bisector of angle A and external bisector of angle B. Mark their intersection as Y.

title: Агол на преклопување на хипотенуза
prompt: Draw a right triangle ABC with right angle at A. On hypotenuse BC, mark point E such that BE=AB and point D such that CD=AC. Connect AD and AE.

title: Збир на нормали во паралелограм
prompt: Draw a parallelogram ABCD with only point D touching a line p. From A, B, and C, draw perpendicular segments AM, BN, and CO to the line p. Mark the intersection of diagonals AC and BD as S, and draw a perpendicular SS' to line p.

title: Пресек на линии во паралелограм
prompt: Draw a parallelogram ABCD. Mark M as the midpoint of BC and N as the midpoint of CD. Draw segments DM and BN and show their intersection T. Draw diagonal AC and diagonal BD, showing they intersect at O and that T lies on AC.

title: Теорема на Вивиани
prompt: Draw an equilateral triangle ABC with altitude h. Place a point S inside and draw perpendiculars SM, SN, and SP to the sides BC, CA, and AB respectively. Connect S to vertices A, B, and C to show three internal triangles.

title: Периметар преку однос на висини
prompt: null

title: Агли во правоаголен триаголник
prompt: Draw a right triangle ABC with right angle at C. Draw altitude CD to hypotenuse AB. Mark segments AD=p and BD=q. Mark point E on AD such that DE=q. Highlight triangles CBE and AEC to show they are isosceles.

title: Симетрија во конвексен четириаголник
prompt: Draw a convex quadrilateral ABCD with a right angle at C. Mark a point P on side CD. Reflect point B across line CD to get B'. Connect A, P, and B' as a straight line. Mark equal angles APD and BPC.

title: Триаголник со разлика на агли од 90 степени
prompt: Draw triangle ABC with angle A significantly larger than angle B. Construct the internal bisector CD and the external bisector CE at vertex C. Extend side AB to meet the external bisector at point E.

title: Симетрала на агол меѓу висина и медијана
prompt: Draw a right triangle ABC with right angle at C. Draw altitude CD, median CM, and angle bisector CL from vertex C to the hypotenuse AB. Label angle A as 40 degrees.

title: Агли во рамнокрак триаголник преку пресек на симетрали
prompt: Draw an isosceles triangle ABC with AB as base. Draw altitude CD from vertex C. Draw angle bisector AE from vertex A. Mark their intersection as I and label the obtuse angle at I as 130 degrees.

title: Пресек на симетрала на страна и симетрала на агол
prompt: Draw an isosceles triangle ABC with side AC = BC. Construct the perpendicular bisector of side AC and the angle bisector of angle A. Mark their intersection point D on the side BC. Label angle C as gamma.

title: Средина на тангентна отсечка
prompt: Draw circle k tangent to arms of angle O at A and B. Draw line BC parallel to OA. Draw segment OC intersecting circle at D. Draw line BD intersecting OA at S.

title: Постоење на впишана кружница во петтоаголник
prompt: Draw a convex pentagon ABCDE. Mark potential tangent points K, L, M, N, P on the sides. Label tangent segments x, y, z, u, v from each vertex.

title: Радиус на трета кружница при допир
prompt: Draw two circles k1 and k2 touching externally at M. Draw a vertical tangent line t touching k2 at N. Draw k3 touching k1, k2, and t. Mark the centers and radii.

title: Паралелограм од средини на отсечки
prompt: Draw a general quadrilateral ABCD. Mark E as midpoint of AB, K as midpoint of CD. Connect AK, CE, BK, DE and mark their midpoints M1, M2, M3, M4. Draw diagonal EK.

title: Растојание од тежиште до рамнина
prompt: Draw triangle ABC in space and a horizontal plane below it. Show perpendicular segments AA', BB', CC' connecting vertices to the plane. Show centroid T and its perpendicular projection T'.

title: Центар на впишана кружница во специфична конфигурација
prompt: Draw two intersecting circles k1 and k2. Let the center O of k2 lie on the boundary of k1. Mark intersection points A and B. Pick a point C on k1 and draw line OC, marking its intersection with k2 as D. Draw triangle ABC and segments AD and BD.

title: Хипотенуза преку периметар и впишан радиус
prompt: Draw a right-angled triangle ABC with incenter I. Draw the incircle tangent to all three sides. Label perimeter as 30 and inradius as 2.

title: Однос на катети преку радиуси
prompt: Draw a right-angled triangle with legs a and b and hypotenuse c. Draw the circumcircle (passing through vertices) and the incircle (tangent to sides). Label radii r and R.

title: Пресметка на агли преку поделба на страна
prompt: Draw triangle ABC. On side BC, mark point D such that the length DC is twice the length of BD. Label angle B as 45 degrees and angle ADC as 60 degrees. Drop altitude AH.

title: Еднаквост на отсечки преку центар на кружница
prompt: Draw triangle ABC with angle A = 70 and angle B = 80. Inside the triangle, place point M such that angle ACM = 10 and angle CBM = 20. Connect M to vertices A, B, and C.

title: Плоштина на рамнокрак трапез со нормални дијагонали
prompt: Draw an isosceles trapezoid ABCD with midsegment 6. Draw diagonals AC and BD intersecting at 90 degrees. Extend base AB to E such that BE = CD and connect CE to show a right triangle ACE.

title: Втора дијагонала на паралелограм
prompt: Draw a parallelogram ABCD with sides labeled 13 and 14. Draw one diagonal labeled 15 and the other diagonal as d2.

title: Паралелност преку средна линија на спротивни страни
prompt: Draw a convex quadrilateral ABCD. Mark midpoints M of AB and N of CD. Draw segment MN. Mark K as midpoint of diagonal AC and show segments MK and KN.

title: Однос на плоштини во поделен паралелограм
prompt: Draw parallelogram ABCD. Draw diagonal BD and mark point M such that MD is 3 times longer than BM. Extend AM to meet BC at N. Shade triangle MND.

title: Симетрична точка на опишана кружница
prompt: Draw an acute triangle ABC. Pick a point D inside such that angle ADB = angle ADC = 180 - angle A. Reflect A over D to get A'. Show that A, B, A', and C all lie on the same circle.

title: Конструкција на нормални прави во кружница
prompt: Draw a circle with diameter AB. Place a point C on AB. Mark N as the midpoint of CB. Draw a vertical line through N to find points X and Y on the circle. Connect AX and CY to show they are perpendicular.

title: Еднаквост на агли во четириаголник со еднакви дијагонали
prompt: Draw quadrilateral ABCD where AC = BD. Construct perpendicular bisectors of AD and BC. Mark their intersection P on segment AB. Highlight congruent triangles APC and DPB.

title: Пресечни кружници и центар на впишана кружница
prompt: Draw circle k2 with center O and circle k1 passing through O. Let A and B be intersection points. Pick point C on k1 and connect OC, marking D on k2. Show AD and CD are angle bisectors of triangle ABC.

title: Страни на контактниот триаголник
prompt: Draw triangle ABC with an incircle. Mark contact points M, N, P. Connect them to form triangle MNP. Draw the incenter I and connect it to vertices and contact points to show right triangles.

title: Поделба на хипотенуза со кружница над средна линија
prompt: Draw a right triangle with legs 5 and 12. Mark midpoints M and N of the legs. Draw a circle with diameter MN. Mark points P and Q where the circle hits the hypotenuse. Show that one point is the midpoint and the other is the altitude foot.

title: Плоштина на триаголник во правоаголник
prompt: Draw rectangle ABCD. Place E on AB (1/3 from A), F on BC (2/3 from B), G midpoint of AD. Shade triangle EFG.

title: 1012_Prob5_Olympic - Равенка на права (Олимписки метод)
prompt: Coordinate system showing a line passing through (2,0) and (0,3). The area formed by the axes and the line is a right triangle.

title: 1012_Prob8_Synthetic - Медијана кон хипотенуза (Синтетички пристап)
prompt: A right triangle ABC with hypotenuse AB. The triangle is completed into a rectangle ACBD with dashed lines. The diagonals AB and CD intersect at M.
